name: DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo
type: datatype
summary: |
  Describes details for a Class.DockWidgetPluginGui.
description: |
  The Datatype.DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo data type describes details for a
  Class.DockWidgetPluginGui. This data type is used when constructing a
  Class.PluginGui via the plugin's
  Class.Plugin:CreateDockWidgetPluginGuiAsync() method.
codesamples: []
tags: []

  - name: DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo.new
    summary: Returns a new DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo object.
    description: The main constructor function for the Datatype.DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo.
    parameters:
      - name: InitialDockState
        type: InitialDockState
        default: Enum.InitialDockState.Right
        summary: ''
      - name: InitialEnabled
        type: bool
        default: false

        default: false

constants: []
properties:
  - name: DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo.InitialEnabled
    type: bool
    summary: |
      The enabled state of the Class.PluginGui if it does not have a saved
      state from a previous session.
    description: |
      The initial enabled state of a Class.PluginGui created using this
      Datatype.DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo. If a Class.PluginGui with the same
      ''pluginGuiId'' has previously been created in an earlier session of
      Roblox Studio, then it will reload that saved enabled state (unless
      InitialEnabledShouldOverrideRestore is true).
    default:
    codesamples: []
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo.InitialEnabledShouldOverrideRestore
    type: bool
    summary: |
      If true, will override any saved enabled state with the InitialEnabled
      value.
    description: |
      If true, the value of InitialEnabled will override the previously saved
      enabled state of a Class.PluginGui being created with this
      Datatype.DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo. The previously saved enabled state is
      loaded based on the pluginGuiId argument of
      Class.Plugin:CreateDockWidgetPluginGuiAsync().
    default:
    codesamples: []
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo.FloatingXSize
    type: number
    summary: |
      The initial pixel width of the PluginGui when floating.
    description: |
      The initial pixel width of a Class.PluginGui created using this
      Datatype.DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo, when the Enum.InitialDockState is
      set to Float.
    default:
    codesamples: []
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo.FloatingYSize
    type: number
    summary: |
      The initial pixel height of the PluginGui when floating.
    description: |
      The initial pixel height of a Class.PluginGui created using this
      Datatype.DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo, when the Enum.InitialDockState is
      set to Float.
    default:
    codesamples: []
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo.MinWidth
    type: number
    summary: |
      The minimum pixel width of the PluginGui.
    description: |
      The minimum width of a Class.PluginGui created using this
      Datatype.DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo, in pixels.

      Each platform has its own absolute minimum that Roblox will enforce. These
      variations exist to account for the contents of the title bar (which
      varies by platform) when the widget is floating. For example, on a Mac,
      the width can never be less than ~80 pixels to accommodate the
      close/minimize/maximize buttons.
    default:
    codesamples: []
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo.MinHeight
    type: number
    summary: |
      The minimum pixel height of the PluginGui.
    description: |
      The minimum height of a Class.PluginGui created using this
      Datatype.DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo, in pixels.
    default:
    codesamples: []
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
